dict.acceptation: 总之；无论如何；不管怎样；随随便便；

sent.orig: Anyhow, in advanced country, became the state with the consumptive top rate of importation.
sent.trans: 总之，在先进国家中，成了输入品的消费比率最高的国家。

sent.orig: We managed to get what we wanted, anyhow.
sent.trans: 无论如何，我们最终得到了我们想要的。

sent.orig: "Cheer up, old man," whispered his companion. "We'll go around, anyhow.
sent.trans: “振作一点，老家伙，"他的朋友对着他的耳朵低声说，"不管怎么样，我们都要去一趟那里。
